metadata.title: CVE-2018-20186 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 1.5.1-627. AP4_Sample::ReadData inCore/Ap4Sample.cpp allows attackers to trigger an attempted excessivememory allocation, related to AP4_DataBuffer::SetDataSize andAP4_DataBuffer::ReallocateBuffer in Core/Ap4DataBuffer.cpp.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
